thread.title: So impressed with this hotel!
thread.title_full: So impressed with this hotel! - Review of Kimpton Hotel Eventi, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: nshein
title: So impressed with this hotel!
text: I thought this hotel was terrific: great location (to downtown, theatre....just super central), super comfortable rooms, friendly and helpful staff, and a really good restaurant. I've tried other, fancier hotels in NYC and many of them were impractical or unfriendly (too dark, not enough space to unpack, staff with attitude, etc.). This one was perfect and I plan to make it my go-to NYC hotel going forward.
